article_title: Hanergy Investors Wait to Cross Suspension Bridge
article_text:
A week after Hanergy Thin Film Power lost half its market value, investors are still stuck. On halt since last Wednesday, the stock exemplifies the problem of incredibly long suspensions for controversial shares in Hong Kong.

Hong Kong regulators finally said Thursday that they are probing the solar company. That gives a formal voice to whispers that the stock may have been manipulated as it ascended nearly sevenfold before its...

twitter.description: After months of suspending disbelief about Hanergy’s value, investors now have to suspend their expectations of trading the stock, too.
twitter.creator: @abheekb
